Case Number: {!workflow_Email__c.Calc_Case_Number__c}
Hi {!workflow_Email__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thank you for contacting StarTrack regarding consignment {!workflow_Email__c.Consignment_Number__c}. We have now corrected the delivery address as per the information you have provided us. Delivery is expected between 1 - 2 business days. If no one is available to accept delivery, a Sorry We Missed You card will be left detailing the next steps.
Please feel free to track your delivery progress online at www.startrack.com.au.
If there is anything else that we can help you with, please feel free to contact us and a customer service consultant will assist you with your enquiry.
Kind Regards,
StarTrack Customer Service Team
